metadata.Title: CVE-2013-6501 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description: The default soap.wsdl_cache_dir setting in (1) php.ini-production and (2) php.ini-development in PHP through 5.6.7 specifies the /tmp directory, which makes it easier for local users to conduct WSDL injection attacks by creating a file under /tmp with a predictable filename that is used by the get_sdl function in ext/soap/php_sdl.c.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> we will not be fixing this issue. In environments where this issue is problematic, we recommend setting soap.wsdl_cache_dir to another location

criterions.comment: php7.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
